name: CKLocationSortDescriptor
desc: An object for sorting records that contain location data.

items.name: init(key: String, relativeLocation: CLLocation)
items.desc: Creates a location sort descriptor using the specified key and relative location.

items.name: init(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a location sort descriptor from a serialized instance.

items.name: var relativeLocation: CLLocation
items.desc: The reference location for sorting records.
